errors.error_description: Version conflict - using pip3 (Python 3) but claiming Python 2.7 compatibility
correction_candidates: Use pip instead of pip3 for Python 2.7 compatibility
Change requirement to Python 3.6+ since using pip3
Specify both Python versions: Compatible with Python 2.7 and 3.6+
Remove version specification: pip install testfixtures
errors.golden_answer: Change requirement to Python 3.6+ since using pip3

errors.error_description: Specific version 6.18.5 may not exist or be outdated, potentially causing installation failure
correction_candidates: Use latest version: pip3 install testfixtures
Use version range: pip3 install testfixtures>=6.0.0
Check available versions: pip3 install testfixtures==
Install from development branch: pip3 install git+https://github.com/simplistix/testfixtures.git
errors.golden_answer: Use latest version: pip3 install testfixtures
